b7ccc08e-7ecd-428c-9ff1-52992e5ee8a8.description: The earner of this digital badge has the skills and knowledge required to follow organisational infection prevention and control procedures, including implementing standard and transmission-based precautions and responding to infection risks. The earner has the skills and knowledge to decrease the risk of and transmission of infection whilst working in various capacities in a retail setting.
b7ccc08e-7ecd-428c-9ff1-52992e5ee8a8.name: Infection Prevention & Control - COVID Safe (Retail)

alignments.name: Unit of Competency HLTINFCOV001 - Comply with infection prevention and control policies and procedures
alignments.description: This unit describes the skills and knowledge required to follow organisational infection prevention and control procedures, including implementing standard and transmission-based precautions and responding to infection risks

badge_template_activities.title: To achieve this qualification, the student must have completed the unit of competency HLTINF001- Comply with infection prevention and control policies and procedures.

Successfully demonstrated ability to follow standard and additional precautions for infection prevention and control, identify infection hazards and assess risks, and follow procedures for managing risks associated with specific hazards, in retail contexts

121263ca-a375-4797-801d-8e5e81f7dceb.description: The earner of this digital badge has the skills and knowledge required to follow organisational infection prevention and control procedures, including implementing standard and transmission-based precautions and responding to infection risks. The earner has the skills and knowledge to decrease the risk of and transmission of infection whilst working in various capacities in transport and logistics.
121263ca-a375-4797-801d-8e5e81f7dceb.name: Infection Prevention & Control - COVID Safe (Transport and Logistics)

badge_template_activities.title: To achieve this qualification, the student must have completed the unit of competency HLTINF001- Comply with infection prevention and control policies and procedures.

Successfully demonstrated ability to follow standard and additional precautions for infection prevention and control, identify infection hazards and assess risks, and follow procedures for managing risks associated with specific hazards, in transport and logistics contexts

eb9c802e-7dad-4efc-b4a5-f7214bcb8c72.description: The earner of this digital badge / credential has the skills and knowledge required to follow organisational infection prevention and control procedures, including implementing standard and transmission-based precautions and responding to infection risks.
eb9c802e-7dad-4efc-b4a5-f7214bcb8c72.name: Infection Control - COVID Safe
